description: Returns Amazon RDS recommendations. Compute Optimizer generates recommendations for Amazon RDS that meet a specific set of requirements. For more information, see the Supported resources and requirements in the Compute Optimizer User Guide.

parameters.name: resourceArns
parameters.description: The ARN that identifies the Amazon RDS. The following is the format of the ARN: arn:aws:rds:{region}:{accountId}:db:{resourceName} The following is the format of a DB Cluster ARN: arn:aws:rds:{region}:{accountId}:cluster:{resourceName} (string) ---

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of Amazon RDS recommendations to return with a single request. To retrieve the remaining results, make another request with the returned nextToken value.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: An array of objects to specify a filter that returns a more specific list of Amazon RDS recommendations. (dict) --- Describes a filter that returns a more specific list of Amazon RDS recommendations. Use this filter with the  GetECSServiceRecommendations action. name (string) --- The name of the filter. Specify Finding to return recommendations with a specific finding classification. You can filter your Amazon RDS recommendations by tag:key and tag-key tags. A tag:key is a key and value combination of a tag assigned to your Amazon RDS recommendations. Use the tag key in the filter name and the tag value as the filter value. For example, to find all Amazon RDS service recommendations that have a tag with the key of Owner and the value of TeamA, specify tag:Owner for the filter name and TeamA for the filter value. A tag-key is the key of a tag assigned to your Amazon RDS recommendations. Use this filter to find all of your Amazon RDS recommendations that have a tag with a specific key. This doesn't consider the tag value. For example, you can find your Amazon RDS service recommendations with a tag key value of Owner or without any tag keys assigned. values (list) --- The value of the filter. (string) ---

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter. Specify Finding to return recommendations with a specific finding classification. You can filter your Amazon RDS recommendations by tag:key and tag-key tags. A tag:key is a key and value combination of a tag assigned to your Amazon RDS recommendations. Use the tag key in the filter name and the tag value as the filter value. For example, to find all Amazon RDS service recommendations that have a tag with the key of Owner and the value of TeamA, specify tag:Owner for the filter name and TeamA for the filter value. A tag-key is the key of a tag assigned to your Amazon RDS recommendations. Use this filter to find all of your Amazon RDS recommendations that have a tag with a specific key. This doesn't consider the tag value. For example, you can find your Amazon RDS service recommendations with a tag key value of Owner or without any tag keys assigned.

parameters.name: accountIds
parameters.description: Return the Amazon RDS recommendations to the specified Amazon Web Services account IDs. If your account is the management account or the delegated administrator of an organization, use this parameter to return the Amazon RDS recommendations to specific member accounts. You can only specify one account ID per request. (string) ---

parameters.name: recommendationPreferences
parameters.description: Describes the recommendation preferences to return in the response of a  GetAutoScalingGroupRecommendations,  GetEC2InstanceRecommendations,  GetEC2RecommendationProjectedMetrics,  GetRDSDatabaseRecommendations, and  GetRDSDatabaseRecommendationProjectedMetrics request. cpuVendorArchitectures (list) --- Specifies the CPU vendor and architecture for Amazon EC2 instance and Auto Scaling group recommendations. For example, when you specify AWS_ARM64 with: A  GetEC2InstanceRecommendations or  GetAutoScalingGroupRecommendations request, Compute Optimizer returns recommendations that consist of Graviton instance types only. A  GetEC2RecommendationProjectedMetrics request, Compute Optimizer returns projected utilization metrics for Graviton instance type recommendations only. A  ExportEC2InstanceRecommendations or  ExportAutoScalingGroupRecommendations request, Compute Optimizer exports recommendations that consist of Graviton instance types only. (string) ---

nested_params.name: cpuVendorArchitectures
nested_params.description: Specifies the CPU vendor and architecture for Amazon EC2 instance and Auto Scaling group recommendations. For example, when you specify AWS_ARM64 with:

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to advance to the next page of Amazon RDS recommendations.

nested_items.name: rdsDBRecommendations
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe the Amazon RDS recommendations.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the current Amazon RDS.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the Amazon RDS.

nested_items.name: engine
nested_items.description: The engine of the RDS instance.

nested_items.name: engineVersion
nested_items.description: The database engine version.

nested_items.name: promotionTier
nested_items.description: The promotion tier for the Aurora instance.

nested_items.name: currentDBInstanceClass
nested_items.description: The DB instance class of the current RDS instance.

nested_items.name: currentStorageConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration of the current RDS storage.

nested_items.name: storageType
nested_items.description: The type of RDS storage.

nested_items.name: allocatedStorage
nested_items.description: The size of the RDS storage in gigabytes (GB).

nested_items.name: iops
nested_items.description: The provisioned IOPs of the RDS storage.

nested_items.name: maxAllocatedStorage
nested_items.description: The maximum limit in gibibytes (GiB) to which Amazon RDS can automatically scale the storage of the RDS instance.

nested_items.name: storageThroughput
nested_items.description: The storage throughput of the RDS storage.

nested_items.name: dbClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier for DB cluster.

nested_items.name: idle
nested_items.description: This indicates if the RDS instance is idle or not.

nested_items.name: instanceFinding
nested_items.description: The finding classification of an Amazon RDS instance.
Underprovisioned -- When Compute Optimizer detects that there's not enough resource specifications, an Amazon RDS is considered under-provisioned.
Overprovisioned -- When Compute Optimizer detects that there's excessive resource specifications, an Amazon RDS is considered over-provisioned.
Optimized -- When the specifications of your Amazon RDS instance meet the performance requirements of your workload, the service is considered optimized.

nested_items.name: storageFinding
nested_items.description: The finding classification of Amazon RDS storage.
Underprovisioned -- When Compute Optimizer detects that there's not enough storage, an Amazon RDS is considered under-provisioned.
Overprovisioned -- When Compute Optimizer detects that there's excessive storage, an Amazon RDS is considered over-provisioned.
Optimized -- When the storage of your Amazon RDS meet the performance requirements of your workload, the service is considered optimized.

nested_items.name: instanceFindingReasonCodes
nested_items.description: The reason for the finding classification of an Amazon RDS instance.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: currentInstancePerformanceRisk
nested_items.description: The performance risk for the current DB instance.

nested_items.name: storageFindingReasonCodes
nested_items.description: The reason for the finding classification of Amazon RDS storage.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: instanceRecommendationOptions
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe the recommendation options for the Amazon RDS instance.

nested_items.name: dbInstanceClass
nested_items.description: Describes the DB instance class recommendation option for your Amazon RDS instance.

nested_items.name: projectedUtilizationMetrics
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe the projected utilization metrics of the RDS instance recommendation option.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the utilization metric.

nested_items.name: statistic
nested_items.description: The statistic of the utilization metric.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the utilization metric.

nested_items.name: performanceRisk
nested_items.description: The performance risk of the RDS instance recommendation option.

nested_items.name: rank
nested_items.description: The rank identifier of the RDS instance recommendation option.

nested_items.name: savingsOpportunity
nested_items.description: Describes the savings opportunity for recommendations of a given resource type or for the recommendation option of an individual resource.

nested_items.name: savingsOpportunityPercentage
nested_items.description: The estimated monthly savings possible as a percentage of monthly cost by adopting Compute Optimizer recommendations for a given resource.

nested_items.name: estimatedMonthlySavings
nested_items.description: An object that describes the estimated monthly savings amount possible by adopting Compute Optimizer recommendations for a given resource. This is based on the On-Demand instance pricing..

nested_items.name: currency
nested_items.description: The currency of the estimated monthly savings.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the estimated monthly savings.

nested_items.name: savingsOpportunityAfterDiscounts
nested_items.description: Describes the savings opportunity for Amazon RDS recommendations or for the recommendation option.

nested_items.name: savingsOpportunityPercentage
nested_items.description: The estimated monthly savings possible as a percentage of monthly cost by adopting Compute Optimizer's Amazon RDS instance recommendations. This includes any applicable Savings Plans discounts.

nested_items.name: estimatedMonthlySavings
nested_items.description: The estimated monthly savings possible by adopting Compute Optimizer's Amazon RDS instance recommendations. This includes any applicable Savings Plans discounts.

nested_items.name: currency
nested_items.description: The currency of the estimated monthly savings.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the estimated monthly savings for Amazon RDS instances.

nested_items.name: storageRecommendationOptions
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe the recommendation options for Amazon RDS storage.

nested_items.name: storageConfiguration
nested_items.description: The recommended storage configuration.

nested_items.name: storageType
nested_items.description: The type of RDS storage.

nested_items.name: allocatedStorage
nested_items.description: The size of the RDS storage in gigabytes (GB).

nested_items.name: iops
nested_items.description: The provisioned IOPs of the RDS storage.

nested_items.name: maxAllocatedStorage
nested_items.description: The maximum limit in gibibytes (GiB) to which Amazon RDS can automatically scale the storage of the RDS instance.

nested_items.name: storageThroughput
nested_items.description: The storage throughput of the RDS storage.

nested_items.name: rank
nested_items.description: The rank identifier of the RDS storage recommendation option.

nested_items.name: savingsOpportunity
nested_items.description: Describes the savings opportunity for recommendations of a given resource type or for the recommendation option of an individual resource.

nested_items.name: savingsOpportunityPercentage
nested_items.description: The estimated monthly savings possible as a percentage of monthly cost by adopting Compute Optimizer recommendations for a given resource.

nested_items.name: estimatedMonthlySavings
nested_items.description: An object that describes the estimated monthly savings amount possible by adopting Compute Optimizer recommendations for a given resource. This is based on the On-Demand instance pricing..

nested_items.name: currency
nested_items.description: The currency of the estimated monthly savings.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the estimated monthly savings.

nested_items.name: savingsOpportunityAfterDiscounts
nested_items.description: Describes the savings opportunity for Amazon RDS storage recommendations or for the recommendation option.

nested_items.name: savingsOpportunityPercentage
nested_items.description: The estimated monthly savings possible as a percentage of monthly cost by adopting Compute Optimizer's Amazon RDS storage recommendations. This includes any applicable Savings Plans discounts.

nested_items.name: estimatedMonthlySavings
nested_items.description: The estimated monthly savings possible by adopting Compute Optimizer's Amazon RDS storage recommendations. This includes any applicable Savings Plans discounts.

nested_items.name: currency
nested_items.description: The currency of the estimated monthly savings.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the estimated monthly savings for Amazon RDS storage.

nested_items.name: utilizationMetrics
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe the utilization metrics of the Amazon RDS.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the utilization metric.

nested_items.name: statistic
nested_items.description: The statistic of the utilization metric.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the utilization metric.

nested_items.name: effectiveRecommendationPreferences
nested_items.description: Describes the effective recommendation preferences for Amazon RDS.

nested_items.name: cpuVendorArchitectures
nested_items.description: Describes the CPU vendor and architecture for Amazon RDS recommendations.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: enhancedInfrastructureMetrics
nested_items.description: Describes the activation status of the enhanced infrastructure metrics preference.

nested_items.name: lookBackPeriod
nested_items.description: The number of days the utilization metrics of the Amazon RDS are analyzed.

nested_items.name: savingsEstimationMode
nested_items.description: Describes the savings estimation mode preference applied for calculating savings opportunity for Amazon RDS.

nested_items.name: source
nested_items.description: Describes the source for calculating the savings opportunity for Amazon RDS.

nested_items.name: lookbackPeriodInDays
nested_items.description: The number of days the Amazon RDS utilization metrics were analyzed.

nested_items.name: lastRefreshTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the Amazon RDS recommendation was last generated.

nested_items.name: tags
nested_items.description: A list of tags assigned to your Amazon RDS recommendations.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: One part of a key-value pair that makes up a tag. A key is a general label that acts like a category for more specific tag values.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: One part of a key-value pair that make up a tag. A value acts as a descriptor within a tag category (key). The value can be empty or null.

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe errors of the request.

nested_items.name: identifier
nested_items.description: The ID of the error.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The message, or reason, for the error.
